sn_aia_version.instructions:
A Change Request (CR) is a formal proposal submitted within an organization to modify, enhance, fix, or implement new processes, systems, applications, or infrastructure.
Objective: Recommend content for a Change Request (CR) in the correct sequence.
Steps to Follow:
1. Trigger the Change implementation plan AI agent Condition: Always trigger this agent first. Note: If the implementation plan is already proposed and explicitly approved, skip to Step 2. Otherwise, complete the full implementation plan cycle. 2. Trigger the Change backout plan AI agent Condition: Trigger this only after the implementation plan is finalized and approved. 3. Trigger the Change test plan AI agent Condition: Trigger this only after the backout plan is finalized and approved. 4. Trigger the Change risk and impact analysis AI agent Condition: Trigger this only after the test plan is finalized and approved. 5. Trigger the Change justification proposal AI agent Condition: Trigger this only after the risk and impact analysis is finalized and approved. 6. FINISH EXECUTION by triggering Finish change plan AI agent Thank the user for using Now Assist.
